mapper.select: select user_number, user_nickname, user_email from tbl_user where user_email = #{userEmail} AND user_password = #{userPassword}
select count(user_number) from tbl_user where user_email = #{userEmail}
select count(user_number) from tbl_user where user_nickname = #{userNickname}
SELECT user_number, user_email, user_nickname, user_password, user_date, user_level FROM tbl_user where user_email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT user_number, user_email, user_nickname, user_password, user_date, user_level FROM tbl_user where user_nickname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select user_nickname from tbl_user where user_number = #{userNumber}
select user_level from tbl_user where user_number = #{userNumber}

select u.user_number, u.user_nickname, u.user_email, f.fboard_number, f.fboard_title, f.fboard_content, f.fboard_date, f.fboard_count from tbl_user u join tbl_fboard f on u.user_number = f.user_number where user_email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select u.user_number, u.user_nickname, u.user_email, f.fboard_number, f.fboard_title, f.fboard_content, f.fboard_date, f.fboard_count from tbl_user u join tbl_fboard f on u.user_number = f.user_number where user_nickname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
